subject: Baseball
World Series
lead_paragraph: For the Mets, next season’s pursuit will be framed differently. One World Series loss, after 14 seasons without a pennant, should rightly be hailed as a success. Another would be a letdown.
snippet: For the Mets, next season’s pursuit will be framed differently. One World Series loss, after 14 seasons without a pennant, should rightly be hailed as a success. Another would be a letdown.
